name: Ritual of the Scarlet Throne
text: This card is used to Ritual Summon *Succubus Princess Reina.* You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field, or banish *Succubus* monsters from your Graveyard, whose total Levels equal 6 or more./nIf this card is sent from the hand or field to the Graveyard: You can add 1 *Succubus* monster from your Deck to your hand, except
You can only use this effect of
